mapper.select: select s.id as id, s.store_name as store_name, s.admin_id as admin_id, s.introduction as introduction, s.detailed_address as detailed_address, s.store_image as store_image, s.latitude as latitude, s.longitude as longitude, s.day_time as day_time, s.type_id as type_id, s.contact_name as contact_name, s.province_id as province_id, s.city_id as city_id, s.area_id as area_id, s.contact_mobile as contact_mobile, s.parent_no as parent_no, s.store_sort as store_sort, s.store_status as store_status, s.is_cancellation as is_cancellation, s.create_time as create_time, s.update_time as update_time from live_user u, live_store_clerk c, live_store s where u.clerk_id = c.id and c.store_id = s.id and u.uid = #{uid}
